events.name: Metals for Renewable Energy Technologies
events.wd_description: Focus on metals and minerals needed for renewable energy technologies in a transition to a low carbon economy (cobalt, graphite, lithium, manganese and nickel).

events.name: Challenges and Opportunities of New Initiatives
